explains: adj. 令人愉快的，惬意的；礼貌而友善的，和蔼可亲的
wordGroup: pleasant to hear 好听；入耳
have a pleasant journey 一路顺风

sentences.en: Paul was a shy, pleasant, solitary man.
sentences.cn: 保罗是个腼腆的、讨人喜欢的、惯于独处的人。

sentences.en: Floating can be a very pleasant sensation.
sentences.cn: 漂浮会给人一种非常愉快的感觉。

sentences.en: The woman had a pleasant face.
sentences.cn: 那个女人长着一张和善的脸。
